thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Lorraine

author: Lorraine
title: Lorraine
text: Second time I've used Flighthub. I asked for alerts for cheap fares and received them. Resulted in a good deal for Chicago and the price Quote: d includes everything...no surprise additions. Although I checked no insurance, it was added on. I called right away and was answered quickly and courteously and the problem was solved. Received my confirmation online and I'm all set to go. Flighthub was recommended by my nephew and I will continue to use it when I travel. Thanks.
